title.narrative: F.a: Burundi: Advancing Constructive Dialogue in Burundi

description.narrative: CMI has been active in Burundi since 2015. National stakeholders and selected international partners have so far welcomed and appreciated the nature of CMI as an independent, impartial, and non-threatening organization. Particularly, CMI provides safe, inf ormal spaces where ideas can be explored, exchanged and tested towards finding common ground for peaceful solutions.#In order to contribute to preparing the ground for a more conducive environment for peaceful political contestation, CMI aims to: provide s pace to cultivate trust and dialogue in the Burundian political arena, support regional efforts aiming at fostering peaceful politics in Burundi, and support key international actors in adopting more coordinated and constructive approaches towards Burundi.
